error.label: Error
error.content: Uh oh, we weren't able to verify your email address. Try resending the email.

success.label: Success
success.content: Yay!  Your message was successfully sent.

text.title: Basic Title
text.content: Bacon ipsum dolor amet tri-tip beef picanha, hamburger shank pork loin kielbasa frankfurter pastrami tongue turducken turkey. Pastrami tongue chuck jowl, chicken leberkas bresaola pork chop bacon andouille.

coachmark.content: Nullam quis risus eget urna mollis ornare vel eu leo. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. Nullam id dolor id nibh ultricies vehicula.
